away without a word. When he reached his sister's room his wife was al- ready awake and her merry voice, hurrying one word after another, came through the open door. She was speaking as usual in French, and as if after long self-restraint she wished to make up for lost time. 
"No, but imagine the old Countess Zubova, 1 with false curls and her mouth full of false teeth, as if she were trying to cheat old age. ... Ha, ha, ha! Mary!"
